description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物，中国共产党党员。曾任新余市市长、中共新余市委书记、江西省发展和改革委员会主任等职。因与原江西省委书记苏荣关系密切，于2014年8月被纪委调查。
description.en: A political figure in the People's Republic of China and a member of the Communist Party of China. He served as Mayor of Xinyu, Secretary of the CPC Xinyu Municipal Committee, and Director of the Jiangxi Provincial Development and Reform Commission. He was investigated by the disciplinary commission in August 2014 due to his close relationship with former Jiangxi Provincial Party Secretary Su Rong.

description.zh-cn: 位于中国江西省的县级市，是李安泽的出生地。
description.en: A county-level city in Jiangxi Province, China, and the birthplace of Li Anze.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的执政党。
description.en: The founding and sole ruling party of the People's Republic of China.

en: Huazhong University of Science and Technology

description.zh-cn: 位于中国湖北省武汉市的综合性研究型大学。
description.en: A public research university located in Wuhan, Hubei, China.

description.zh-cn: 曾负责江西省地方税收征管工作的政府机构。
description.en: A former government agency responsible for the collection and administration of local taxes in Jiangxi Province.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国江西省新余市的地方国家行政机关。
description.en: The local state administrative organ of Xinyu City, Jiangxi Province, People's Republic of China.

nodes.id: 中国共产党新余市委员会

zh-cn: 中国共产党新余市委员会

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在江西省新余市的地方组织。
description.en: The local organization of the Communist Party of China in Xinyu City, Jiangxi Province.

nodes.id: 江西省发展和改革委员会

zh-cn: 江西省发展和改革委员会

description.zh-cn: 负责江西省经济和社会发展宏观调控的省政府组成部门。
description.en: A component department of the Jiangxi Provincial Government responsible for macroeconomic regulation of economic and social development in the province.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任中共江西省委书记，后因严重违纪违法被查处。
description.en: A former Chinese politician who served as the Communist Party Secretary of Jiangxi. He was later investigated for serious violations of discipline and law.

description.zh-cn: 李安泽之兄，曾任江西省质量技术监督局副巡视员，于2015年12月被调查。
description.en: Elder brother of Li Anze. He served as Deputy Inspector of the Jiangxi Provincial Bureau of Quality and Technical Supervision and was investigated in December 2015.

nodes.id: 中国共产党江西省纪律检查委员会

zh-cn: 中国共产党江西省纪律检查委员会
en: CPC Jiangxi Provincial Commission for Discipline Inspection

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在江西省的纪律检查机关。
description.en: The provincial-level discipline inspection agency of the Communist Party of China in Jiangxi.

degree.zh-cn: 经济学硕士, 管理学博士
degree.en: Master of Economics, Doctor of Management

relationships.target: 中国共产党新余市委员会
江西省发展和改革委员会

description.zh-cn: 李安泽与时任江西省委书记的苏荣关系密切。
description.en: Li Anze had a close relationship with Su Rong, who was then the Party Secretary of Jiangxi.

description.zh-cn: 李安泽因与已落马的苏荣关系密切而被纪委带走调查。
description.en: Li Anze was taken away for investigation by the disciplinary commission due to his close relationship with the disgraced Su Rong.

description.zh-cn: 据媒体报道，李安泽曾巴结苏荣之妻于丽芳。
description.en: According to media reports, Li Anze curried favor with Yu Lifang, the wife of Su Rong.

description.zh-cn: 李安运是李安泽的兄长。
description.en: Li Anyun is the elder brother of Li Anze.

relationships.source: 中国共产党江西省纪律检查委员会

description.zh-cn: 中共江西省纪委对李安运进行立案调查。
description.en: The CPC Jiangxi Provincial Commission for Discipline Inspection placed Li Anyun under investigation.
